titles.title: A bill to extend for three years the existing duty-free treatment of certain needlecraft display models, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to extend, through June 30, 1988, the duty-free treatment of certain needlecraft display models and aprons and baby bibs. Provides a refund on any duty paid on such articles that enter the United States on or after a specified date and before the date of enactment of this Act.
